title: Police identifies Sri Lankan youth knifed to death in Liverpool
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma Merseyside Police identified the Sri Lankan youth was stabbed to death in Huyton, Liverpool, UK as Appuhamillage A. Mahesh Wickramasinghe. He is from Madampe, Negambo and 30 years old at the time of his death. Mahesh has been stabbed by an unidentified person Tuesday night on 29 November around…
